message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in excellence and efficiency. Considering its quality and unique features, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. My initial offer is $15000. Let me know if this aligns with your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on this product. However, $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $10000 for it. If you're open to that, we can make a deal. Let me know what you think.
